analysis.summary: The field 'recipient_address' is an address field requiring structured address components for proper validation and formatting
insights: Field name 'recipient_address' clearly indicates a mailing/shipping address
Address fields typically require multiple components (street, city, state, zip)
As a recipient address, this is likely critical for delivery or correspondence
Standard address validation can prevent delivery failures
recommendations: Implement multi-line address input with fields for: street address, apartment/suite (optional), city, state/province, postal code, country
Add address validation using postal service APIs (USPS, Google Places) for accuracy
Consider autocomplete functionality to reduce input errors
Mark as high priority since incorrect addresses can cause significant issues
Include format examples based on country selection
